thread.title: 'The Martian' vs. 'The Walk' and more: Everything you need to know about this week's new movies in 4 minutes (audio)
thread.title_full: 'The Martian' vs. 'The Walk' and more: Everything you need to know about this week's new movies in 4 minutes (audio) | NOLA.com

author: Mike Scott, NOLA.com | The Times-Picayune
title: 'The Martian' vs. 'The Walk' and more: Everything you need to know about this week's new movies in 4 minutes (audio)
text:
As part of my regular Friday-morning conversation with WRNO-FM radio host Gerry Vaillancourt about new films in theaters, this week I talk about such new arrivals as the Matt Damon sci-fi adventure " The Martian ," the Joseph Gordon-Levitt tightrope drama " The Walk " and the Emily Blunt crime drama " Sicario ." Have a listen in the below audio clip. You also can tune in live every Friday at 6:40 and 8:10 a.m. on WRNO-99.5 FM in New Orleans, WJBO-1150 AM in Baton Rouge, and News Radio 104.9 FM in Biloxi, Miss.
And, as always, you can find more on all of this week's new movies -- including full reviews -- as well as details on local movie events at www.nola.com/movies .
